members.name: Protea
members.address: Off Benin Sapele Rd, Oka, Benin City 300251, Edo State
members.description: Enjoy hotel services at our restaurant, bar, spa, fitness center and swimming pool. Host meetings and events at our hotel where conference facilities allows 24 hour access to our business center and complimentary WiFi.

members.name: Choice Gate
members.address: G.R.A, 11, Nneka Street, Off Ugbor Rd, Benin City, Edo State
members.description: Indulge in the beautifully appointed rooms and suites, each thoughtfully designed to ensure your utmost comfort. Whether business or leisure, the hotel offers a perfect blend of modern amenities and timeless elegance.

members.name: Viewpoint
members.address: 1 Aiguobasinmwin Crescent, Benin City, Edo State
members.description: We provides accommodations with a garden, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. With free WiFi, this 5-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Some units at the property feature a balcony with a city view.

members.name: Randekhi Gold Wing
members.address: 8 Uhenuyi St, Oka, Benin City 300251, Edo State
members.description: Our bright and tastefully furnished rooms, which are decorated with modern interior designs and selected antique furniture, will make you feel good. The stunning views will make your stay unforgettable.

members.name: Golden Tulip
members.address: 23/27 Etete Road, Off Benin Sapele Rd, Benin City, Edo State
members.description: Operated as Excalibur Hotels in the last 13 years and is currently re-branded after the opening of an additional brand new block of 65 keys; comprising Apartments, 1,2,3 bedrooms suites as well as single rooms.

members.name: Shamrockmanor
members.address: 20 2nd Ugbor Road, Off Oka, Benin City 300102, Edo State
members.description: We offer accommodations with a fitness center, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. Each room at our 5-star hotel has city views, and guests can enjoy access to a restaurant and to a bar.

members.name: Hotel Adonai
members.address: 359 Osahon Ikuobase Avenue, Limit Road, Ugbor Rd, Benin City 300251, Edo
members.description: Our 3-star hotel offers accommodations with a restaurant, free private parking and a bar, room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The property provides a concierge service, and currency exchange for guests.

members.name: Morzi
members.address: Plot 209 Ugbor, By, Ugbor Road Country Home Road, Junction, Benin City
members.description: All guest rooms in our hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Some units at Morzi Hotel also boast a balcony. Guest rooms at the accommodation have air conditioning and a desk.

current.title: Exclusive Saturday
current.about: Join us for "Sunset Summer Fest" on June 22, 2024, at 4 PM in Central Park. Enjoy live music, gourmet food, artisanal crafts, and kidsâ€™ activities. Relax with cocktails and end the night with a fireworks display. Perfect for friends and family!

current.title: Grilled Night
current.about: Join us for "Grilled Night" on June 25, 2024, at 4 PM! Enjoy mouth-watering grilled dishes, live music, and great company. The perfect evening to unwind and savor summer flavors. Location details will be shared upon RSVP. Don't miss out!

current.title: Old School Thursday
current.about: Join us for "Old School Thursday" on June 27, 2024, at 4 PM! Relive the classics with retro music, vintage games, and nostalgic fun. Location details will be shared upon RSVP. Don't miss this blast from the past!

current.title: Throw Back Thursday
current.about: Join us for "Throwback Thursday" on June 29, 2024, at 5 PM! Enjoy retro tunes, classic games, and nostalgic vibes. An evening filled with fun and memories. Location details will be shared upon RSVP. Don't miss the blast from the past!
